Blog
My newest practice is blogging where I keep my learnings. It contains knowledge I gain while building my own programs. Things I learn while listening to other programmers. As well as, a cannabis section, where I keep a photo log of my current cultivation also in Angular.
Compass
The past year and a half I worked as a fullstack engineer at Compass, mostly in Angular and Sinatra(ruby). Most notably established the frontend integrations of Google Analytics, Stripe, Shopify, Paypal, Facebook, Amazon Seller Marketplace, and Amazon Vendor Marketplace.
LinkedIn
In the navbar I will have a resume and a link to a Google Sheet. However, if you want to connect via LinkedIn you can find me here. Warning: It is updated less frequently than my current resume.
Youtube Gaming
A recent switch from Twitch TV to Youtube Gaming due to quality. I am now happily streaming, uploading, and reviewing various game play. A stiffler for high quality 1080p60fps, my uploads will have you enjoying the game in the finest rendering. New to my site are a few playlists to help you easily navigate my gaming. Including a new VR playlist, where you can find me gaming and reviewing VR games weekly!
SmartiPants Game
SmartiPants is a N-Back game, utilizing up to 3 stimuli and 9 back. The only type of game scientifically proven to increase memory. I helped build the logic in the game and built the graphs to track progress in your profile.
FitNaps
A Rainmeter integration used to display FitBit sleep and activity. Utilizes Google Sheets and IFTTT to easily parse data from various websites. Held the number 1 spot in r/Rainmeter for the explaination of my integration. Currently marked at 2.5k views.
